refnamediv.refpurpose: Using Python code to extend Virtuoso.

refsect1.title: Overview
refsect1.para: The following tutorial demonstrates how Virtuoso can be extended through the use of Python.
The demonstrations in this section highlight transparent integration (hosting) between Virtuoso and the Python Runtime.

refsect1.title: Prerequisites
refsect1.para: The following prerequisites ensure the usability of these tutorial demos on any platform with a Python runtime:

itemizedlist.listitem: Python should be compiled to have lybpython2.2 as a shared object
Virtuoso Universal Server with Python Runtime Hosting module
